articles.title: Now, ‘party drug’ ketamine will work as a quick antidepressant? US researchers tell us how - ThePrint
articles.description: US study published in 'Nature' shows that ketamine targets a specific group of brain cells to 'restore lost neural connections within hours', reversing depression temporarily.
articles.content: Bengaluru: Past studies have shown that ketamine is a rapid antidepressant, working within mere hours to produce a substantial alteration in a patient’s mind state, as opposed to traditional antidepr… [+3734 chars]
